column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD AT NEWTOWN PIKE:
column4: The exit ramp from the INNER LOOP of New Circle Rd to outbound Newtown Pike (toward I-75) is shut down until further notice due to a jackknifed semi.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD AT NEWTOWN PIKE:
column4: Motorists needing to access I-75 will need to use an alternate route.

column5: A pedestrian is reportedly involved.  All outbound lanes are shut down.
